div.p: One of the new things you can do with your pension is to cash it all in one go
Normally a quarter of your pot is tax-free but it’s really important to remember
that the other three quarters of your pot is subject to tax
It’s also important to think about how will you live
throughout retirement if you take this option
If you’d like to hear more about how this applies to you,
book your own free Pension Wise appointment
